name: Cloning Waves
description:
Cloning Waves - GGJ 2017

Description

A game created for global game jam 2017, theme was WAVES. Cloning Waves is a puzzle game where the player must navigate obstcles to get to the end of the level, the cake.

The player must navigate my using various wave patterns. The player has limited uses of waves and must figure out how to properly navigate the level.  

Controls

Up/ Down arrows    - cycle through waves
Space     - use selected wave
Left/ Right arrows - change direction
Esc   - Pause 

Credits

Tyler Pearce   - Programming/ Design
Tim Jennings - Programming/ Design
Joris Daniel Hoogsteder - Sound Designer
